ovdesc.p: This table will store the accrued balances (calculated balances) for different asset types per contract.

desc.p: This field holds the previous balance of an asset type in Local Currency for Foreign currency contracts
This field denotes the last calculated amount for the asset type.
The summation of this field and the amount in the balance field will give you the current balance of the asset type.
This field denotes the date at which the LAST.CALC.AMT was calculated.
This field holds the NPV of the contractual cash flow under FairValue method, i.e. at Market Rate
This field holds the NPV of the expected cash flow under Amortised cost, i.e. at EIR
This field denotes the last calculated amount for the asset type in Local currency for foreign currency contracts
This field holds the value of the expected collateral under Amortised cost method
This field holds the value of the expected collateral under fairvalue method
This field holds the NPV of expected cash flow under fairvalue method, i.e. Market Rate
This field holds the NPV of the contractual cash flow under Amortised cost method, i.e at EIR
This will be the id of the underlying contract.
This field denotes the Asset types namely AMORTISED, FAIRVALUE, DISCLOSURE, IMPAIR.AMORTISED, UNWIND or IMPAIR.AMC.ADJUST.
This field holds the previous balance of an asset type.
Field denotes the T24 book value of the contract.
Once a contract is impaired, this field will also include the balances of the Past due record related to the contract if any.
This field holds all the Hedged contract numbers defined under a particular Hedge group relation.
Denotes the associative set for HEDGED.BOOK.COST and HEDGED.FAIR.VALUE fields
Field holds the book cost of each contract for the Hedged items defined under IAS.HEDGE.GROUP table.
Associated with the HEDGED.CONTRACT.ID field.
Field holds the fair value of each contract for the Hedged items defined under IAS.HEDGE.GROUP table.
This field holds all the Hedging contract numbers defined under a particular Hedge group relation.
Denotes the associative set for HEDGING.BOOK.COST and HEDGING.FAIR.VALUE fields
Field holds the book cost of each contract for the Hedging items defined under IAS.HEDGE.GROUP table.
Associated with the HEDGING.CONTRACT.ID field.
Field holds the fair value of each contract for the Hedging items defined under IAS.HEDGE.GROUP table.
Associated with the HEDGING.CONTRACT.ID field.
Field denotes the Hedge status for the Hedge relation defined in IAS.HEDGE.GROUP table.
